what: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
title: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
text: Retrieve data UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API. package part econdataverse family packages aimed helping economists financial professionals work sovereign-level economic data. Roadmap Add support API functions parameters Add support Bulk Data Download Service (BDDS)

title: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
text: can install development version uisapi GitHub :

title: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
text: Load package: fetch indicators specific entities, can call: can get information available entities via: list available indicators can retrieved via: API supports versioning can retrieve versions using: interested current default version, can use parameter default:
code: library(uisapi) uis_get(   entities = c("BRA", "USA"),   indicators = c("CR.1", "CR.2"),   start_year = 2010,   end_year = 2020 ) #> [1] 6 #> # A tibble: 36 × 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       CR.1          2011  89.9 #>  2 BRA       CR.1          2012  91.6 #>  3 BRA       CR.1          2013  91.5 #>  4 BRA       CR.1          2014  92.9 #>  5 BRA       CR.1          2015  93.2 #>  6 BRA       CR.1          2016  93.8 #>  7 BRA       CR.1          2017  94.6 #>  8 BRA       CR.1          2018  95.1 #>  9 BRA       CR.1          2019  95.7 #> 10 BRA       CR.1          2020  96.3 #> # ℹ 26 more rows uis_get_entities() #> # A tibble: 467 × 4 #>    entity_id entity_name          entity_type region_group #>    <chr>     <chr>                <chr>       <chr>        #>  1 ABW       Aruba                NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  2 AFG       Afghanistan          NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  3 AGO       Angola               NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  4 AIA       Anguilla             NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  5 ALA       Åland Islands        NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  6 ALB       Albania              NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  7 AND       Andorra              NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  8 ANT       Netherlands Antilles NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  9 ARE       United Arab Emirates NATIONAL    <NA>         #> 10 ARG       Argentina            NATIONAL    <NA>         #> # ℹ 457 more rows uis_get_indicators() #> # A tibble: 4,247 × 7 #>    indicator_id indicator_name     theme last_data_update last_data_update_des…¹ #>    <chr>        <chr>              <chr> <chr>            <chr>                  #>  1 10           Official entrance… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  2 10403        Start month of th… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  3 10404        End month of the … EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  4 10405        Start of the acad… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  5 10406        End of the academ… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  6 13           Theoretical durat… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  7 200101       Total population … DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  8 200144       Population aged 1… DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  9 200151       Population aged 6… DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #> 10 200343       Population aged 1… DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #> # ℹ 4,237 more rows #> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​last_data_update_description #> # ℹ 2 more variables: data_availability <list>, entity_types <list> uis_get_versions() #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   version           publication_date         description                theme    #>   <chr>             <chr>                    <chr>                      <list>   #> 1 20250225-2ae60fad 2025-02-27T15:29:19.309Z February 2025 DR           <tibble> #> 2 20241121-61101499 2024-11-21T23:37:39.608Z SCCI Data refresh – Nov 2… <tibble> #> 3 20241113-98786d81 2024-11-21T18:57:35.136Z SCCI data refresh          <tibble> #> 4 20241030-9d4d089e 2024-10-30T17:28:00.868Z Drop data for CIV on MYS … <tibble> #> 5 20240913-b8ca1963 2024-09-15T14:44:07.750Z Glossary Update            <tibble> #> 6 20240910-b5ad4d82 2024-09-11T06:15:13.018Z September 2024 Data Relea… <tibble> uis_get_versions(default = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 1 × 4 #>   version           publication_date         description      theme            #>   <chr>             <chr>                    <chr>            <list>           #> 1 20250225-2ae60fad 2025-02-27T15:29:19.309Z February 2025 DR <tibble [4 × 3]>

what: Get data from the UIS API — uis_get
title: Get data from the UIS API — uis_get
text: Retrieves data UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API specified entities, indicators, time periods.

title: Get data from the UIS API — uis_get
code: uis_get(   entities = NULL,   indicators = NULL,   start_year = NULL,   end_year = NULL,   version = NULL )

title: Get data from the UIS API — uis_get
text: entities Character vector. entity IDs (geoUnits) retrieve data . Must provide either parameter indicators . indicators Character vector. indicator IDs retrieve data . Must provide either parameter entities . start_year Numeric character. starting year data retrieval period. NULL, start year constraint applied. end_year Numeric character. ending year data retrieval period. NULL, end year constraint applied. version Character. API version use. NULL, default version used.

title: Get data from the UIS API — uis_get
text: data frame following columns: entity_id Character. ID entity (geoUnit). indicator_id Character. ID indicator. year Numeric. year observation. value Numeric. value indicator given entity year.

title: Get data from the UIS API — uis_get
code: # \donttest{ # Get all data for a single indicator uis_get(   indicators = "CR.1" ) #> [1] 6 #> # A tibble: 1,552 × 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 AFG       CR.1          2011  40.7 #>  2 AFG       CR.1          2015  54.5 #>  3 AFG       CR.1          2022  44.2 #>  4 AGO       CR.1          2015  60.0 #>  5 ALB       CR.1          2000  95.2 #>  6 ALB       CR.1          2005  98.9 #>  7 ALB       CR.1          2009  98.2 #>  8 ALB       CR.1          2017  97.4 #>  9 ARG       CR.1          2000  95.5 #> 10 ARG       CR.1          2001  95.6 #> # ℹ 1,542 more rows  # Get all data for a single country uis_get(   entities = "BRA" ) #> [1] 6 #> # A tibble: 46,290 × 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       10            1999     0 #>  2 BRA       10            2000     0 #>  3 BRA       10            2001     0 #>  4 BRA       10            2002     0 #>  5 BRA       10            2003     0 #>  6 BRA       10            2004     0 #>  7 BRA       10            2005     0 #>  8 BRA       10            2006     0 #>  9 BRA       10            2007     0 #> 10 BRA       10            2008     0 #> # ℹ 46,280 more rows  # Get data for multiple indicators and countries uis_get(   entities = c("BRA", "USA"),   indicators = c("CR.1", "CR.2") ) #> [1] 6 #> # A tibble: 66 × 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       CR.1          2001  82   #>  2 BRA       CR.1          2002  84.1 #>  3 BRA       CR.1          2003  86.6 #>  4 BRA       CR.1          2004  87.4 #>  5 BRA       CR.1          2005  87.9 #>  6 BRA       CR.1          2006  89.3 #>  7 BRA       CR.1          2007  88.4 #>  8 BRA       CR.1          2008  88.4 #>  9 BRA       CR.1          2009  88.6 #> 10 BRA       CR.1          2011  89.9 #> # ℹ 56 more rows  # Get data for multiple indicators and countries and specific time range uis_get(   entities = c("BRA", "USA"),   indicators = c("CR.1", "CR.2"),   start_year = 2010,   end_year = 2020 ) #> [1] 6 #> # A tibble: 36 × 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       CR.1          2011  89.9 #>  2 BRA       CR.1          2012  91.6 #>  3 BRA       CR.1          2013  91.5 #>  4 BRA       CR.1          2014  92.9 #>  5 BRA       CR.1          2015  93.2 #>  6 BRA       CR.1          2016  93.8 #>  7 BRA       CR.1          2017  94.6 #>  8 BRA       CR.1          2018  95.1 #>  9 BRA       CR.1          2019  95.7 #> 10 BRA       CR.1          2020  96.3 #> # ℹ 26 more rows # }

what: Get geographical entities from UIS API — uis_get_entities
title: Get geographical entities from UIS API — uis_get_entities
text: Retrieves information geographical entities (countries, regions, etc.) available UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API.

title: Get geographical entities from UIS API — uis_get_entities
Get geographical entities from UIS API — uis_get_entities
text: version Character. API version use. NULL (default), API's default version used.

title: Get geographical entities from UIS API — uis_get_entities
text: data frame information geographical entities: entity_id Character. unique identifier entity. entity_name Character. name geographical entity. entity_typ Character. type entity (e.g., country, region). region_group Character list. Information region grouping.

title: Get geographical entities from UIS API — uis_get_entities
code: # \donttest{ # Download entities for default version uis_get_entities() #> # A tibble: 467 × 4 #>    entity_id entity_name          entity_type region_group #>    <chr>     <chr>                <chr>       <chr>        #>  1 ABW       Aruba                NATIONAL    NA           #>  2 AFG       Afghanistan          NATIONAL    NA           #>  3 AGO       Angola               NATIONAL    NA           #>  4 AIA       Anguilla             NATIONAL    NA           #>  5 ALA       Åland Islands        NATIONAL    NA           #>  6 ALB       Albania              NATIONAL    NA           #>  7 AND       Andorra              NATIONAL    NA           #>  8 ANT       Netherlands Antilles NATIONAL    NA           #>  9 ARE       United Arab Emirates NATIONAL    NA           #> 10 ARG       Argentina            NATIONAL    NA           #> # ℹ 457 more rows  # Download entities for a specific version uis_get_entities("20240910-b5ad4d82") #> # A tibble: 475 × 4 #>    entity_id entity_name          entity_type region_group #>    <chr>     <chr>                <chr>       <chr>        #>  1 ABW       Aruba                NATIONAL    NA           #>  2 AFG       Afghanistan          NATIONAL    NA           #>  3 AGO       Angola               NATIONAL    NA           #>  4 AIA       Anguilla             NATIONAL    NA           #>  5 ALA       Åland Islands        NATIONAL    NA           #>  6 ALB       Albania              NATIONAL    NA           #>  7 AND       Andorra              NATIONAL    NA           #>  8 ANT       Netherlands Antilles NATIONAL    NA           #>  9 ARE       United Arab Emirates NATIONAL    NA           #> 10 ARG       Argentina            NATIONAL    NA           #> # ℹ 465 more rows # }

what: Get indicator definitions from UIS API — uis_get_indicators
title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API — uis_get_indicators
text: Retrieves information indicators available UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API, including definitions, data availability, associated metadata.

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API — uis_get_indicators
code: uis_get_indicators(   version = NULL,   disaggregations = FALSE,   glossary_terms = FALSE )

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API — uis_get_indicators
text: version Character. API version use. NULL (default), API's default version used. disaggregations Logical. TRUE, includes disaggregation information indicators. Default FALSE. glossary_terms Logical. TRUE, includes glossary terms associated indicators. Default FALSE.

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API — uis_get_indicators
text: data frame information indicators: indicator_id Character. unique identifier indicator. indicator_name Character. name indicator. data_availability List column. Contains nested information data availability, including total record count timeline min/max years. entity_types List column. Contains information entity types associated indicator.

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API — uis_get_indicators
code: # \donttest{ uis_get_indicators() #> # A tibble: 4,247 × 7 #>    indicator_id indicator_name     theme last_data_update last_data_update_des…¹ #>    <chr>        <chr>              <chr> <chr>            <chr>                  #>  1 10           Official entrance… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  2 10403        Start month of th… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  3 10404        End month of the … EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  4 10405        Start of the acad… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  5 10406        End of the academ… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  6 13           Theoretical durat… EDUC… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  7 200101       Total population … DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  8 200144       Population aged 1… DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #>  9 200151       Population aged 6… DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #> 10 200343       Population aged 1… DEMO… 2025-02-23       February 2025 Data Re… #> # ℹ 4,237 more rows #> # ℹ abbreviated name: ¹​last_data_update_description #> # ℹ 2 more variables: data_availability <list>, entity_types <list> # }

what: Get available UIS API versions — uis_get_versions
title: Get available UIS API versions — uis_get_versions
text: Retrieves information available versions UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API, including version IDs, descriptions, theme data.

title: Get available UIS API versions — uis_get_versions
Get available UIS API versions — uis_get_versions
text: default Logical. Indicates whether current default version retrievend. Defaults FALSE.

title: Get available UIS API versions — uis_get_versions
text: data frame following columns: id Character. version identifier. code Character. version code. description Character. description version. release_date Character. date version released. theme List column. element nested data frame containing information themes available version, columns: theme_id, theme_last_update, theme_description

title: Get available UIS API versions — uis_get_versions
code: # \donttest{ uis_get_versions() #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   version           publication_date         description                theme    #>   <chr>             <chr>                    <chr>                      <list>   #> 1 20250225-2ae60fad 2025-02-27T15:29:19.309Z February 2025 DR           <tibble> #> 2 20241121-61101499 2024-11-21T23:37:39.608Z SCCI Data refresh – Nov 2… <tibble> #> 3 20241113-98786d81 2024-11-21T18:57:35.136Z SCCI data refresh          <tibble> #> 4 20241030-9d4d089e 2024-10-30T17:28:00.868Z Drop data for CIV on MYS … <tibble> #> 5 20240913-b8ca1963 2024-09-15T14:44:07.750Z Glossary Update            <tibble> #> 6 20240910-b5ad4d82 2024-09-11T06:15:13.018Z September 2024 Data Relea… <tibble> # }
